mapper.select: select e.id as id, s.small_sb_no as smallNo, b.mark_number as betonNo, e.time as time, e.temperature as temperature, e.norm as norm, e.operator as operator, e.bl as bl from inbound_temp_info e left join pouring_base p on e.pouring_base_id=p.id left join small_storage_bin s on p.small_sb_id = s.id left join beton b on p.beton_id = b.id

SELECT e.pouring_base_id AS pouringBaseId, avg(e.temperature) AS avgTemp, max(e.temperature) AS topTemp, min(e.temperature) AS bottomTemp, max(e.norm) AS normTemp, count(e.id) AS recordCount, sum(e.temperature > e.norm) AS excessiveCount FROM inbound_temp_info e GROUP BY pouringBaseId

SELECT t2.*, if(t2.temp>=t2.norm,'是','否') as isCb FROM ( SELECT s.small_sb_no AS sbNo, max(e.time) AS time FROM inbound_temp_info e LEFT JOIN pouring_base p ON e.pouring_base_id = p.id LEFT JOIN small_storage_bin s ON p.small_sb_id = s.id GROUP BY s.small_sb_no ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.small_sb_no AS sbNo, e.time AS time, e.temperature AS temp, e.norm AS norm FROM inbound_temp_info e LEFT JOIN pouring_base p ON e.pouring_base_id = p.id LEFT JOIN small_storage_bin s ON p.small_sb_id = s.id ) t2 ON t1.sbNo = t2.sbNo AND t1.time = t2.time
